website_summaries.verdict: A multi-purpose tool with a number of features that are useful beyond escaping your vehicle.
pros: Besides the window hammer and seat-belt cutter, this tool has an LED flashlight and red SOS light
Additionally, it features a hand-cranked charging system that can provide enough power to get a quick emergency call out if your phone has died
cons: The unit is larger than many other escape tools and may be a bit cumbersome for some users

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy Vehicle Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I bought LUXON Emergency Tool 7-in-1 Car Safety Tool. It is very handy tool to place in my car. I tried all the functions the instruction mentioned. They all worked pretty well, especially the flash light and phone charger. The flash light is very bright and clear, which can make me see anything in the dark and people can notice me as well. I tried the hand cracking charger as well. It charged my phone up to 5% within in 6 mins. It's definitely an "insurance" for me when I need charge my phone in an emergency situation. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Haitao Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Very useful tool. The flashlight has several flashing mode and can be charged by hand cranking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful tool overall. I like the hand cranking charge system, which means you won't be worried about the battery in any emergency. The seatbelt cutter seems quite sharp. I feel safer after having this in my car.
customer_reviews.author: kingxmyth

customer_reviews.title: I Like it. Most features i can used not only ...
customer_reviews.text: Just use this Emergency Tool Kit in my recent travel. The flashlight surpriseD me. If fully charged, it also can power cellphone. I Like it. Most features i can used not only in the car. It is worth to have it for safe . Will buy another set for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: High Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, bright led light, bright amber lights, the integrated battery charges my phone fairly quickly which is a plus. Haven't tested out the window breaker or the seat belt cutter but I will update this when I do. The only con is that the magnets at the front near the light are not strong enough to keep the tool attached to a car. Other than that it's a MUST have for your car.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency tool
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those “how will I know if this thing really works” kinda guy, sooo I went to auto salvage lot and paid $10 to break two windows on a wrecked Dodge Charger (similar windows to my Challenger). The Tungsten steel tip shattered the glass (safely) and the entire window fell out. It was easier to use on the driver side because I am right handed, it took two hits when I was in the passenger seat. However, both windows were successfully shattered and removed. It also makes short work of cutting a seat belt. Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Leith

customer_reviews.title: Poor user instructions, baffling switch
customer_reviews.text: No useful user instructions. Couldn't figure out how to turn on bright red flashing light. Finally got the red lights flashing, and now I can't figure out how to turn them off. I just packed it up for return as it happily flashes away. In an emergency, I don't want to be fiddling around looking for the right combination of actions on one-button interface to turn on the flashing LEDs. Also, one of the red LEDs diodes was DOA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Light and Tool
customer_reviews.text: I had the power go out due to a storm about a week after this item came. The light performed great. The USB charger is not going to quick charge your phone by any means, but it does charge it. I really like the light and tool. PLUS PLUS PLUS
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kim

customer_reviews.title: price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Combined safety belt cutter and broken window hammer. This is an important item of your car, but it must be installed so that it is still in place, even in major accidents. The Amazon looks good and the price is reasonable. It should be installed to the floor, door, or the bottom of the dash easy to reach the driver.
customer_reviews.author: JACK STRAHM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tool to keep in your glovebox. The light is bright and I’ve had no problems so far. Have not tried smashing my window with it! But I’m sure it’ll work. The seat belt cutter is sharp and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Brownlow

customer_reviews.title: The building quality is definitely excellent, handy and ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: The building quality is definitely excellent, handy and ergonomic. Multiple functions are built in such a compact device which is a must in the car especially in emergency. I would like to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry L

customer_reviews.title: Hope to never have to need it...
customer_reviews.text: First, I bought four of these. Found them all to be exactly as specified. As they are for emergencies, I hope no one in my family has to use them but they provide comfort in the fact that they have great features for emergency situations. I did have to contact the manufacturer for clarification on something and was completely satisfied with their prompt attention to my needs and customer service. It was impressive their friendly and helpful response. Would highly recommend the product for your cars in case of an emergency and have confidence in their wonderful customer support should you have any concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Three

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Get one for every car! I got 2 of these and they work great! I tested the charger and Even the charger works better than the cell phone charger I use normally. It comes with a universal charger cord so if you have an iPhone plan to keep one in your car in case of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 4 month ago and left it in my car, I took it out yesterday and found out the flashlight did not work anymore. I thought it is durable....
customer_reviews.author: ilJKDli

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional, & practical
customer_reviews.text: It works well as expected in terms of the flashlight--charging by electrical & mechanical Though I did not test the seatbelt cutter & and the pointed glass breaker, they seemed reliable to me. The flashlight past long--i left it on in the night for few days while on trip to Africa. Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Nero

customer_reviews.title: A nice accessory for the car
customer_reviews.text: This works very well but keep it stored close to you in the car. It should be within an arms reach if you are in an accident and need to cut your seatbelt strap or alert responders with the spotlight. It fit nicely in the door pocket of my Equinox.
customer_reviews.author: MJWmisty

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how long the charge for the flashlight lasts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back. I spun the crank to see how it worked and then plopped it in my car and semi-forgot about it. I picked it up a couple of days ago and even after months of non-use in a hot car the internal battery still had enough charge to shine the flashlight. Pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Dave

customer_reviews.title: A 'Must Have' for your car!
customer_reviews.text: The item is as described and was delivered as promised. Love all the functions in the tool and knowing that it is available when needed. Sturdy and well-built. The hammer and seat belt cutter are good. I haven’t used it yet, but I don’t want to either. But I am sure it will do the job, it does really give me a sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: FEI DUAN

customer_reviews.title: I had thought to velcro it to the dash for easy access in an emergency as it will be of ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is HUGE! I had thought to velcro it to the dash for easy access in an emergency as it will be of no good if stored in the glove box or comes tumbling out of a center console in a crash but this is WAY too big for that. Going to have to figure out something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rustie

customer_reviews.title: The weird flashing wouldn't turn off no matter what you ...
customer_reviews.text: The weird flashing wouldn't turn off no matter what you tried to do. It was still flashing in the box for return. Guess it can just flash all the way back then.
customer_reviews.author: BenBen

customer_reviews.title: Not fully tested - Need a car charger since it's a car emergency tool??
customer_reviews.text: Since this tool is designed for car emergency situation, LUXON why you didn't supply this tool with a car charger??? This is a total fail or thought out, not every car has a USB port! I didn't get test out the seat belt cutter or experience the low battery and has to crank it yet. I will keep you all posted on that.
customer_reviews.author: Julie's review

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind owning it.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use this product yet (thankfully) and the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because A. I have not used it and B. Because it's a bit big and clunky (personal opinion) hopefully I will never have to use it but it's peace of mind having it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A little large for car storage
customer_reviews.text: The features of the Luxon tool are great and it works as specified. I was surprised how large it is, but at least it will be easy to quickly find in an emergency. appears to be well constructed and I would expect it to perform well in an emergency, good purchase for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: JDPompano

customer_reviews.title: This tool could save your life
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest tool for having in your car "just in case." It can cut your seat belt and break your window if you are trapped. It even includes a triangle for clearly indicating you're in trouble. Every car should have one.
customer_reviews.author: constant reader

customer_reviews.title: I like gadgets
customer_reviews.text: Charged my phone up kinda sorta, and that was enough for me. I will worry about the auto glass breaking, and seat belt cutting when it's too late of course.
customer_reviews.author: spudboy100

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these - one for each vehicle. I hope to never have to use these, but glad to have them in case they are ever needed.

customer_reviews.title: great product !
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product, the delivery was prompt and the product was just as advertised. I would recommend you to all my associates.

customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a flash light, a flashing emergency red light, a seat belt cutter, and window smasher and can be charged via USB and 12V car charger.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a first time driver

customer_reviews.title: I like the versatility of this emergency tool kit
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of this emergency tool kit. The one drawback I see and it may be something of an issue of personal taste is that I would have preferred for the main body be constructed of something other than plastic. Perhaps a shockproof hard rubber. It would have given the item more heft and a better sense of stability against accidental dropping.

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Brand new item. 3 days after a full charge it was dead.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I bought the "emergency tool kit" thinking it would be useful for charging a phone. Charged it via the included USB cord, checked it again 3 days later and it was completely dead. Not even enough power to turn on the flashlight. Sure, I could crank it to charge the phone, but then what's the point of including a battery? The flashlight is junk but even if it were decent, it would take two hands to operate since the battery doesn't hold a charge.

The flashlight is more than bright enough for any road side needs or finding your way through the woods. The magnets are more than strong enough to hold it tight against your car when using the tail flashers. The crank is quiet and solid and the battery capacity is excellent. Just buy it!

I bought this for my Son in law for Xhristm ass and he loves it. I am planning to get one for every member of my family next Christmas. Great product!

I feel safer in case of an emergency- and feel this should be in all cars!!

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a few days of use
customer_reviews.text: The tool initially seemed to be of good quality, but it broke and stopped working within a few days of purchasing it. Initially, the brightness of the front light started dimming. Thinking it to be a charging issue, I charged the tool, but it still did not improve the brightness. Then a few days later, the usb charging port stopped working. In spite of fully charging the tool and using the hand crank, the usb port would not work. Overall, a very poorly built, poor quality product.

That would be a bad time to find out it doesn't work!

product_meta.title: Emergency Tool Kit with LED Flashlight & USB Charger 7-in-1 Rescue Tool Vehicle Emergency Escape Tool with Window Breaker & Seat Belt Cutter Car Safety Hammer for Roadside / Automotive Emergency Kit
feature_bullets: ◈7 in 1 EMERGENCY KIT: This multifunctional tool contains car safety hammer, seat belt cutter, red indicating light(SOS lighting), magnet, LED flashlight (bright/dim/flashing), USB charger with cables, hand cranking charging system.

◈WINDOW BREAKER & SEAT BELT CUTTER: The car safety hammer as an emergency escape tool can break the windows, and the seat belt cutter with sharp razor blade can cut off the seat belts. Allowing you to escape quickly from your vehicle in an emergency situation.

◈HAND CRANKING CHARGING SYSTEM: The emergency tool with USB charger and USB cable has a special skill to save itself, that is hand power generation. As well as, it can charging for most phones in an emergency circumstance.

◈LIGHTING TOOL & EMERGENCY SOS: When you are in the dark or emergency, you can use the car emergency kit with LED light as a lighting tool. The led light with flashlight function also can be used as emergency SOS for asking for help.
